contact.title: Get in Touch!
contact.description: If you want to get in touch with me, you can send me an email or follow me on my social networks.

intro.name: Juan Francisco Lopez
intro.description: Software developer experienced in JavaScript, React, Python, and Java, specializing in designing intuitive applications. Skilled at solving complex problems, backed by 3 years in customer service. Excellent communication and teamwork skills, focused on efficient solutions and technical collaboration.
